Style Guide

Colors

All Sass color variables prefixed with $color-. This makes it easy to figure out what a variable is for later.

Primary

$color-cwru-blue
#0a304e
$color-link-blue
#3168a6
$color-lime-green
#c1cd24

Grays

$color-white
#FFF
$color-black
#000
$color-off-white
#f6f6f6
